short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark all the open tabs in the current window!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: User can simply provide a folder name and click the "Done" button to bookmark all the open tabs in the current window. A new folder will be created in the bookmarks bar with the user provided name in which all the URLs that are bookmarked are visible. Users can install it if they want to save their time and efforts when they want to bookmark each and every tab in the current window. The extension is light weight, simple, and easier to use.
